alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Granite and northwestern Ravalli Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hamilton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Stevensville, Victor, Woodside, Pinesdale, Grantsdale, Bell Crossing, Charlos Heights, Corvallis and Como. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 33 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
